Title: Guilty as Sin
Writer: Stan Lee (based on the Marvel comics by), Bill Everett (based on the Marvel comics by), Drew Goddard (created by), Whit Anderson, Whit Anderson (executive story editor), Luke Kalteux (executive story editor), Sneha Koorse (executive story editor)
Actors: Charlie Cox, Deborah Ann Woll, Elden Henson, Jon Bernthal
Plot: As the firm's trial spins out of control, a figure from Murdock's past returns to deliver shocking revelations about the future of Hell's Kitchen.
